author: Osborne,Bruce
subject: Part 1 to my new fanfic is up!
body:
Well, I have the first part written continuing from the prologue now of my
Lupin III fanfic, if you are interested in reading it its now up at:

www.thesoyokaze.net/fanfic/LupinIII

Thanks, I'm interested in all the C&C's you have ^_^
Remember this is a rough draft. The Prologue's revision will happen
sometime this weekend.
--------------------------------------
Bruce Osborne
ICQ: 3 1 3 7 9 2 3 7 
Email: saitoh-hajime@neo.rr.com
URL: http://www.thesoyokaze.net
